org.springframework.kafka.requestreply

Class ReplyingKafkaTemplate.TemplateRequestReplyFuture<K,V,R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.util.concurrent.SettableListenableFuture<org.apache.kafka.clients.consumer.ConsumerRecord<K,R>>

        • org.springframework.kafka.requestreply.ReplyingKafkaTemplate.TemplateRequestReplyFuture<K,V,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key type.
    V - the outbound data type.
    R - the reply data type. TODO: Remove this in 2.3 - adds no value to the super class
